inputFiles.description: Patterns of files to test, if this input isn't passed then all files included in the tsconfig are used

tsconfig.description: TypeScript configuration, only required if inputFiles aren't passed

banner.description: Text to be prepended to each output file of type T where T is one of: css | js

footer.description: Text to be appended to each output file of type T where T is one of: css | js

inject.description: Import the file F into all input files and automatically replace matching globals with imports

target.description: Environment target(s) (e.g. es2017, chrome58, firefox57, safari11, edge16, node10, ie9, opera45, esnext) (default: es2022)

conditions.description: Custom conditions to include during resolution

watch.description: Whether to watch and re-run tests on changes
